metadata.title: CVE-2024-42161 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bpf: Avoid uninitialized value in BPF_CORE_READ_BITFIELD[Changes from V1: - Use a default branch in the switch statement to initialize `val'.]GCC warns that `val' may be used uninitialized in theBPF_CRE_READ_BITFIELD macro, defined in bpf_core_read.h as:	[...]	unsigned long long val;						      \	[...]								      \	switch (__CORE_RELO(s, field, BYTE_SIZE)) {			      \	case 1: val = *(const unsigned char *)p; break;			      \	case 2: val = *(const unsigned short *)p; break;		      \	case 4: val = *(const unsigned int *)p; break;			      \	case 8: val = *(const unsigned long long *)p; break;		      \        }       							      \	[...]	val;								      \	}								      \This patch adds a default entry in the switch statement that sets`val' to zero in order to avoid the warning, and random values to beused in case __builtin_preserve_field_info returns unexpected valuesfor BPF_FIELD_BYTE_SIZE.Tested in bpf-next master.No regressions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-42161` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-generic - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-143-lowlatency - 4.8.0-39.42~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-1102-aws - 4.15.0-1030.31~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1114-azure - 4.11.0-1009.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-extra-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1003-fips - 4.4.0-1003.3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro
